arts.ttl: Udinese vs. Verona: the Triveneto derby
arts.sum: Udinese and Verona set to meet at the Bluenergy Stadium on matchday 1 Udinese secured safety in last season`s championship, finishing in eleventh place with the same 44 points as Torino, who won 2 fewer matches but achieved 6 more draws and 4 fewer defeats than the Friuli side.
